authors.author: Clara Teare Williams Ralph E. Hudson

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Hallelujah! I have found Him newline Whom my soul so long has craved! newline Jesus satisfies my longings; newline Thro' His blood I now am saved.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All my lifelong I had panted, newline For a draught from some cool spring newline That I hoped would quench the burning newline Of the thirst I felt within.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Feeding on the husks around me newline Till my strength was almost gone, newline Longed my soul for something better, newline Only still to hunger on.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Poor I was and sought for riches, newline Something that would satisfy; newline But the dust I gathered round me newline Only mocked my soul's sad cry.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Well of water, ever springing, newline Bread of life, so rich and free, newline Untold wealth that never faileth, newline My Redeemer is to me.
